items.title: Heyya - the website for the HR company.
items.desc:
Heyya - 5-page responsive website developed using modern technology. The site was developed using a Mobile-first approach and BEM methodology.
The work was done with high quality and on time. Working with Nick brought me not only pleasure but also invaluable experience!
list: Grid: Adaptive grid according to layout (CSS Grid + Flexboxes)
Adaptability of the layout: Responsive + Adaptive
Cross-browser compatibility: IE10 +, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari

items.title: Website of the WeMake - Engineering and Build company.
items.desc:
The client’s task was to create the Dutch version of the site (4 pages), which is fully consistent with the English version.An additional task was to create a feedback form. In the course of the work, small changes were made in the structure and design of the site.
The project was completed on time. Working with this client brought me only pleasure and I hope for our further cooperation!
list: Adaptability of the layout: Responsive + Adaptive
Cross-browser compatibility: IE10 +, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari

items.title: Seabright - Landing page for a mobile application.
items.desc:
Completely responsive, modern website for the application, created on the basis of the latest technologies.
The design was provided in Figma.
Fast and high-quality website. The work was completed on time and the client was satisfied.
list: Adaptability of the layout: Responsive + Adaptive
Cross-browser compatibility: IE10 +, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari
